text:
-tyuqta yadyaqndhO Bava#tiq praiva pa#SyatyaqgnayE# puqtrava#tE purOqDASa#maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEqdindrA#ya puqtriNE# purOqDASaqmEkA#daSakapAlaM praqjAkA#mOq&gnirEqvAsmai$ praqjAMpra#jaqnaya#ti vRuqddhAmindraqH pra ya#cCatyaqgnayEq rasa#vatE&jakShIqrE caqruM nirva#pEqdyaH kAqmayE#taq rasa#vAnth-syAqmityaqgnimEqva rasa#vantaq(gg)q svEna# 
BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa Eqvainaq(gm)q rasa#vantaM karOtiq - [  ]  18
